channel.title: The Micronaut Podcast
channel.description: Episodes cover a variety of topics (interviews, tips, news...) surrounding the Micronaut framework.

item.title: 010 - Micronaut Email
item.author: Sergio del Amo
item.itunes:title: 010 - Micronaut Email
item.itunes:author: Sergio del Amo
item.itunes:summary: Sergio del Amo (Micronaut Developer Advocate) talks about Micronaut Email
item.content:encoded:
Agenda

  • Micronaut Live

March Training

  • Micronaut Essentials
  • Jumpstart your Micronaut Applications with AWS Lambda

Sergio Talks:

  • Manchester JUG Introduction to Micronaut

Graeme Talks:

  • Building Optimized Java Microservices with Micronaut 3 & GraalVM
  • J on the Beach
  • JavaDay Lviv

Level-Up

  • OrderUtil

Main

  • Micronaut Email
  • Send Emails with Amazon SES from a Micronaut Application
  • Send Emails with Sendgrid from a Micronaut Application

  • Tools and Infrastructure Partners Gradle Enterprise

  • Corporate Sponsors

Content

  • Deploy to Google Cloud Compute

item.title: 013 - Micronaut Maven
item.author: Sergio del Amo
item.itunes:title: 013 - Micronaut Maven
item.itunes:author: Sergio del Amo
item.itunes:summary: Sergio del Amo talks to Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal about Micronaut Maven Plugin.
item.content:encoded:
Sergio del Amo talks to Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal about:

  • Micronaut Maven Project Generation
  • Micronaut Maven Plugin
  • Hot Restarting
  • Packaging
  • Docker Support
  • Runtimes
  • Micronaut AOT
  • Micronaut Test Resources
  • Deploying
  • jib

Agenda

  • J4K / UNLEASH THE POWER OF YOUR APPLICATIONS WITH MICRONAUT AND GRAALVM / 28th Septmeber / Online / Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
  • DevoxxMA GRAALVM CLOUD NATIVE & MICRONAUT DEEP DIVE 4th October / Agadir, Morocco / Graeme Rocher
  • DevoxxMA / IMPLEMENTING KUBERNETES OPERATORS IN JAVA WITH MICRONAUT / 4th OctoberAgadir, Morocco / Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
  • Workshop / JUMPSTART YOUR JAVA APPLICATIONS WITH AWS LAMBDA AND THE MICRONAUT FRAMEWORK / 5th October / London / Sergio del Amo
  • JavaOne / ACCELERATING MICROSERVICE PRODUCTIVITY WITH JAVA, GRAALVM, AND MICRONAUT / 18th October / Online / Graeme Rocher
  • JavaOne / BUILDING DATABASE APPLICATIONS WITH MICRONAUT DATA AND GRAALVM / 19th October / Online / Graeme Rocher, Burt Beckwith
  • JavaOne / BUILDING JAVA CLOUD APPLICATIONS WITH MICRONAUT, GRAALVM CLOUD NATIVE, OCI / 19th October / Online / Graeme Rocher
  • Heapconf / UNLEASH THE POWER OF YOUR APPLICATIONS WITH MICRONAUT AND GRAALVM / 3rd – 4th November / Belgrade, Serbia / Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal

  • Micronaut Patterns: Composite

item.title: 009 - Micronaut Features from a Grails Application
item.author: Sergio del Amo
item.itunes:title: 009 - Micronaut Features from a Grails Application
item.itunes:author: Sergio del Amo
item.itunes:summary: Sergio del Amo (Micronaut Developer Advocate) talks with the Agorapulse crew. Agorapulse was a pioneer in the usage of Micronaut features from Grails Application. Moreover, they maintain several open-source libraries to help integrate Micronaut and Grails, and they have written about their migration from Grails to Micronaut.
item.content:encoded:
Agorapulse

  • @Agorapulse
  • Szmon Stepniak @wololock
  • Vladimír Oraný @musketyr

Agenda

  • Micronaut Live

Training:

  • Introduction to Grails Security
  • Using Micronaut Features in a Grails Application

Sergio Talks:

  • Manchester JUG Introduction to Micronaut

Graeme Talks:

  • Building Optimized Java Microservices with Micronaut 3 & GraalVM
  • J on the Beach
  • JavaDay Lviv

Level-Up

  • StringUtils
  • CollectionUtils

Main

  • Micronaut Grails
  • Agorapulse OSS Hub

Testing Libraries

  • Dru - Data Reconstruction Utility
  • Gru - Grooy HTTP Testing Framework
  • JSONAssert

Goodbye Grails, Hello Micronaut

  • Multiproject
  • Configuration
  • Static Compilation
  • Datasets
  • Marshalling
  • Domain Classes
  • Services
  • Controllers
  • Micronaut Application
  • Micronaut Data

  • Ambassador: Object Computing
  • Bronze: SAFRI.NET
  • Bronze: Vizor Games
  • Tools and Infrastructure Partners Gradle Enterprise

  • Community Sponsors
  • Corporate Sponsors

item.title: 007 - Agorapulse Micronaut libraries
item.author: Sergio del Amo
item.itunes:title: 007 - Agorapulse Micronaut libraries
item.itunes:author: Sergio del Amo
item.itunes:summary: Sergio del Amo (Micronaut Developer Advocate) talks with the Agorapulse crew. Agorapulse maintains several open-source Micronaut libraries. They talk about some of them (Snitch, Recurly, Rethrow, Segment, Newrelic, Worker, Console, Pierrot ...).
item.content:encoded:
Agorapulse

  • @Agorapulse
  • Benoit Hediard @benorama
  • Szmon Stepniak @wololock
  • Vladimír Oraný @musketyr

Agenda

  • Micronaut Live

Training:

  • Using Micronaut Features in a Grails Application

Talks:

  • Building Optimized Java Microservices with Micronaut 3 & GraalVM

Level-Up

  • StringUtils
  • CollectionUtils

Main

  • Agorapulse OSS Hub

  • Micronaut Recurly Library. It provides configuration for Recurly Java Client.

  • Micronaut Snitch. Integrates with Dead Man's Snitch to help you to keep track of running asynchronous jobs.

  • Micronaut Rethrow. It catches errors of given type and rethrows them as another type.

  • Micronaut Segment allows you to integrate with Segment.

  • Micronaut Newrelic allows you to integrate with NewRelic.

  • Micronaut Facebook SDK

  • Micronaut Worker a library for advanced scheduling and work distribution.

  • Micronaut Console

  • Micronaut Pierrot

Mentioned:

  • Ersatz
  • Sentry

Micronaut Foundation Sponsors

  • Ambassador: Object Computing
  • Bronze: SAFRI.NET
  • Bronze: Vizor Games
  • Tools and Infrastructure Partners Gradle Enterprise

Sponsors

  • Community Sponsors
  • Corporate Sponsors

Sounds effects obtained from zapsplat.com

item.title: 016 - Micronaut Framework 3.8.0 and AWS Lambda SnapStart
item.author: Sergio del Amo
item.itunes:title: 016 - Micronaut Framework 3.8.0 and AWS Lambda SnapStart
item.itunes:author: Sergio del Amo
item.itunes:summary: Sergio del Amo talks to Mark Sailes about Amazon CDK, AWS, AWS Lambda Snapstart and Micronaut Framework 3.8.0
item.content:encoded:
Sergio del Amo talks to Mark Sailes, senior specialist solutions architect at AWS, about Micronaut Framework 3.8.0 release and AWS Lambda Snapstart.

Agenda

AWS CDK

  • Sample Application Micronaut Lambda TODO
  • Micronaut CRaC
  • CRaC (Coordinated Restore at Checkpoint)

News

  • Micronaut Framework 3.8.0 Released!
  • GraalVM 22.3.0
  • Micronaut Security AOT Optimizations
  • Micronaut Security PKCE
  • Micronaut Data Multi-tenancy
  • Micronaut Data Azure
  • Micronaut GCP Cloud Events
  • Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) SDK v3.
  • Micronaut Alexa Locale Resolution
  • Micronaut AWS API Gateway Stage Resolver

item.title: 014 - Micronaut Object Storage
item.author: Sergio del Amo
item.itunes:title: 014 - Micronaut Object Storage
item.itunes:author: Sergio del Amo
item.itunes:summary: Sergio del Amo talks to Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal about Micronaut Object Storage.
item.content:encoded:
Sergio del Amo talks to Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal about Micronaut Object Storage.

Agenda

  • 13th October / Webinar / Leveraging MicroStream In Your Micronaut Applications / Sergio del Amo, Markus Kett, Florian Habermann.
  • JavaOne
  • 18th October / JavaOne / Graeme Rocher Accelerating Microservice Productivity with Java, GraalVM, and Micronaut
  • 18th October / JavaOne / Building Database Applications with Micronaut Data and GraalVM / Graeme Rocher, Burt Beckwith.
  • 19th October / JavaOne / Building Java Cloud Applications with Micronaut, GraalVM Cloud Native, OCI / Graeme Rocher.
  • 25th October / Geecon Prague / Slack & Micronaut – prefect combo for your side project / Prague, Czech Republic / Vladimir Oraný
  • 25th October / Geecon Prague / It’s an HTTP client. It feels like Spring Data. It’s a Micronaut declarative HTTP client! / Prague, Czech Republic / Szymon Stepniak
  • 25th October / Geecon Prague / Micronaut Turbo – The return of the Monolith / Prague, Czech Republic / Sergio del Amo.
  • 3rd – 4th November / Heapconf / Unleash the power of your applications with Micronaut and GraalVM / Belgrade, Serbia / Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
  • 7th – 10th November / Online Training / Micronaut Data / Sergio del Amo
  • 14th – 17th November / Online Training / Event-Driven Microservices with the Micronaut Framework / Zak Klein

Objec Storage Guides

  • Use the Micronaut Object Storage API to Store files in Google Cloud Storage.
  • Use the Micronaut Object Storage API to Store files in Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) Object Storage.
  • Use the Micronaut Object Storage API to Store files in Google Cloud Storage.

Micronaut Launch Object Storage Features

  • object-storage-aws
  • object-storage-azure
  • object-storage-gcp
  • object-storage-oracle-cloud

item.title: 004 - Micronaut Data
item.author: Sergio del Amo
item.itunes:title: 004 - Micronaut Data
item.itunes:author: Sergio del Amo
item.itunes:summary: Sergio del Amo (Micronaut Developer Advocate) talks about Micronaut Data with Graeme Rocher (Micronaut co-founder). Micronaut Data is a database access toolkit that uses Ahead of Time (AoT) compilation to pre-compute queries for repository interfaces that are then executed by a thin, lightweight runtime layer.
item.content:encoded:
Agenda

  • Micronaut Live

Training:

  • Building secure applications with the Micronaut framework
  • Micronaut Testing Tips & Tricks

Talks:

  • Graeme's talks about Micronaut
  • Multi Cloud Serverless with Micronaut & GraalVM

Level Up

  • Repositories with Criteria API

Road to Micronaut Data

  • Grails Framework
  • GORM Data Services
  • Working with Spring Data Repositories

Micronaut Data

  • Repository Interfaces
  • DTO Projections
  • Query Criteria
  • Pagination
  • Micronaut Data JDBC
  • Micronaut Data R2DBC

Micronaut Foundation Sponsors

  • Ambassador: Object Computing
  • Bronze: SAFRI.NET

Sponsors

  • Community Sponsors
  • Corporate Sponsors

Guides & Tutorials

  • Micronaut Data and Java Records
  • Accessing a database with Micronaut Data JDBC

item.title: 017 - How Nexthink uses Micronaut Framework
item.author: Sergio del Amo
item.itunes:title: 017 - How Nexthink uses Micronaut Framework
item.itunes:author: Sergio del Amo
item.itunes:summary: Sergio del Amo talks to Marcos Lobo about how Nexthink uses the Micronaut Framework.
item.content:encoded:
Sergio del Amo talks to Marcos Lobo about how Nexthink uses the Micronaut Framework. They talk about architecture, which modules they use, how Nexthink deploys Micronaut applications, what language do they use, and their experience with the framework.

Talks

item.title: 008 - Micronaut Serialization
item.author: Sergio del Amo
item.itunes:title: 008 - Micronaut Serialization
item.itunes:author: Sergio del Amo
item.itunes:summary: Sergio del Amo (Micronaut Developer Advocate) talks about Micronaut Serialization with Graeme Rocher (Micronaut co-founder). Micronaut Serialization can serialize and deserialize Java types (including Java 17 records) to and from JSON and other formats without using reflection.
